description: “The FBI is behaving like it’s above the law.” That’s what Sen. Charles Grassley (R-Iowa) had to say after the bureau rebuffed a judge’s request for information about what it has been able to obtain from a thumb drive and server related to former secretary of state Hillary Clinton’s e-mail system. “Simply refusing to cooperate […]
title: Grassley blasts FBI over Clinton e-mails; White House warns China on cyberespionage; Wyden wins in Intel panel debate
